Work_preference.I would like to work independently: I would like to work independently
Work_preference.I would like to be busy on a case-by-cas: I would like to be busy on a case-by-case basis
Work_preference.I am looking for a permanent job: I am looking for a permanent job
Work_preference.I want / have to stay below the marginal: I want / have to stay below the marginal income limit

profile.headline: My Profile

master.title: Personal Information
master.description: Please enter your personal data like name and address here.
master.subtitle: Personal Data

summary.text: You have entered all the data. Please complete the form by submitting the profile.
summary.title: Congratulation!

confirmation.title: Thank you very much!
confirmation.text: We have received your profile and are now checking your information. You will receive an e-mail when you have been successfully enrolled.

legal.heading: Legal Data
legal.description: Please enter your bank details, as well as your identity card details.

description.single-doc: Please download the following document and upload the completed and signed document here.
description.more-docs:
Please download the following documents.
Afterwards please upload the completed and signed documents again here.

contract_freelancer.heading: Work as a Freelancer

selector.label: I would like to work as a Freelancer
selector.inactive_label: I do not want to work as a Freelancer
selector.description: Please activate if you want to work with a freelance

contract_freelancer.description:
You take on assignments as a Freelancer on the basis of work contracts.
For this, a freelance and a tax number are required. The billing is done by invoices based on services rendered.

contract_tax_card.heading: Work as a Temporary Employee

selector.label: I would like to work as a Temporary Employee
selector.inactive_label: I do not want to work as a Temporary Employee
selector.description: Please activate the button if you want to work via your temporary employee.
selector.message: There are job application and/or active assignment linked to this contract Type , you can't change it, please contact staff admin

contract_tax_card.description: You will be hired as an employee for the duration of your working days. As an employer, we will automatically pay you monthly wages based on the hours worked. You don't need a freelance and you don't have to keep your own book-keeping/invoices.

terms.heading: General Terms and Conditions (GTC)
terms.description:
Here you will find the framework agreement and other documents that are important.
Some of these documents you will have to download and upload post signing those documents, for other documents it is enough to confirm that you have read them.

main.headline: Qualification & Training
main.description: Please provide references for your current and previous jobs. You can also upload your references and certificates here.

languages.headline: Languages
languages.description: Only enter languages that you speak fluently.

training.headline: Training & External Certification
training.description: If you have attend any training and/or completed any professional certification, that would be of interest to us, please enter the details here and upload the relevant certificates

references.headline: References
references.description: If you think that reference from previous jobs could be helpful for us, please add them here. This will make your profile more meaningful.</br> Please enter the details here and upload the relevant documents (if any)

list.headline: Education
list.description: If you have attended training courses or obtained certificates that could be of interest to us, please enter the information here and upload the relevant certificates.

education.headline: Education
education.description: If you have attended formal education that could be of interest to us, please enter the highest level of education here and upload the relevant certificates.

qualifications.add-qualification-disabled: Please complete your information about previous education, then you can add further education.
qualifications.add-training-disabled: Please complete your information about previous training, then you can add further training.
qualifications.add-reference-disabled: Please complete your information on previous references, then you can add more references.

main.headline: Employment Information
main.description: Please provide Employment Information for your current and previous jobs. You can also upload your Employment Information here.

work-history.headline: Employment History
work-history.description: Please provide your employment details (to start with the most recent / current one first) and upload relevant certificates

skill.headline: Skill
skill.description:
Please provid your skills(select all the appropriate skills from the drop-down). Please note there are few skills where you need to provide
proof/certificate of acquiring the respective skills.

role.headline: Role
role.description: Please Provide your role details (select one primary role from the drop-down)

work_preferences.headline: Work Preferences
work_preferences.description: Please choose everything that applies to you

work_conditions.1: I have no wishes and am open to all offers
work_conditions.2: I would like to work independently
work_conditions.3: I would like to be busy on a case-by-case basis
work_conditions.4: I'm looking for a permanent job
work_conditions.5: I want / have to stay below the marginal income limit
work_conditions.6: I have another job where I am permanently employed
work_conditions.7: I have another job that I work for occasionally
work_conditions.8: This is my first time working in Austria

pictures-sedcard.headline: Photos & Sizing Info
pictures-sedcard.description:
Please make sure your photos have a minimum resolution of 150dpi and are in portrait format. The minimum resolution is 600 x 400 pixels. The maximum file size is 32MB.

You cannot change the images for your sedcard after we have selected them.

relationship.label: Relationship
relationship.The person was senior to you but didn't: The person was senior to you but didn't manage directly
relationship.You were senior to the person but didn't: You were senior to the person but didn't manage directly
relationship.You worked with the person in same group: You worked with the person in same group
relationship.The person worked with you but in differ: The person worked with you but in different group
relationship.you were a client to the person: You were a client to the person

isVerification.label: Please click the check-box as your consent, to contact the referal for verification by our team

document.label: UPLOAD DOCUMENTS (E.G CERTIFICATE) Add documents,photos,sites,videos and presentations

industryExposure.label: Industry Exposure
industryExposure.description: Please provide your industry exposure as part of your professional  engagement with different client/global brands

legal-certificate.required: Completion of the test is a prerequisite for full registration.

onboarding.inreview: Your data is currently being checked by us.
onboarding.missing-contract-type:
To start with us, you have to choose at least one contract type.
You can also sign up for both contract types at once, or choose another contract type later on.

profile.pending-contract-type:
Your profile has not been activated yet. Please update and save your data again.
Only after activation, you can submit offers for this contract type again.
profile.pending-contract-type-approval: (The details have not yet been checked or have been rejected!)

tax_class.label: Tax Class
tax_class.hint: Which tax class should be used for the settlement of your expenses?

socialsecurity_number.label: Social Security Number
socialsecurity_number.hint: Notes on the Social Security Number

gtc.upcoming:
We updated our terms and conditions for work {contract_type_identifier, select, freelancer { via freelance} other{ via temporary employee}} on {publishedDate}.
To continue working for us, we need your confirmation of the new master agreement by {validDate}.
gtc.upcoming-tax_card:
We updated our terms and conditions for work via temporary employee on {{publishedDate}}.
To continue working for us, we need your confirmation of the new master agreement by {{validDate}}.
gtc.upcoming-freelancer:
We updated our terms and conditions for work via freelance on {{publishedDate}}.
To continue working for us, we need your confirmation of the new master agreement by {{validDate}}.
gtc.pending: Your changes in the area of work {contract_type_identifier, select, freelancer { via freelance} other{ via wage tax card}} are still being checked by us.
gtc.pending-tax_card: Your changes in the area of work via wage tax card are still being checked by us.
gtc.pending-freelancer: Your changes in the area of work via freelance are still being checked by us.
gtc.missing:
Since {{validDate}} our new terms and conditions for work {contract_type_identifier, select, freelancer { via Freelance} other{ via Temporary Employee}} are valid .
To continue working for us, we still need your confirmation of the new master agreement.
gtc.missing-tax_card:
Since {{validDate}} our new terms and conditions for work via Temporary Employee are valid .
To continue working for us, we still need your confirmation of the new master agreement.
gtc.missing-freelancer:
Since {{validDate}} our new terms and conditions for work via Freelance are valid .
To continue working for us, we still need your confirmation of the new master agreement.
gtc.todo-hint: Please go to the appropriate section in your profile and open the documents, read them carefully and confirm the content by clicking the 'Accept' button and upload them again after getting them signed.

confirm.message: hereby confirm that I have read and understood {{identifier}}.

reconfirm.title: Reconfirm
reconfirm.message: Do you want to save your changes?

checked.hint: You have to read and confirm this document!

state.confirmed: The content of this document has been confirmed.
state.unconfirmed: The content of this document has not been confirmed yet.

upload-signed.hint: You have to download this document, sign it and upload it here!
